Package org.jpws.pwslib.data

Interface Summary
PwsBlockInputStream Interface defines a low-level streaming device of data blocks of a fixed length.
PwsBlockOutputStream Interface defines a low-level streaming device for data blocks of a fixed length.
PwsFileListener Interface defines a state change notification method for listeners for PWS record lists and their modifications.
PwsFileOutputSocket.RawFieldWriter Interface defining a device designed to write objects of type PwsRawField to an encrypted output stream.
PwsRawFieldReader Interface extending an iterator over PwsRawField objects decrypted from the persistent state of a PWS file.
 

Class Summary
ContextFile A ContextFile is the combination of ApplicationAdapter and a filepath.
HeaderFieldList A descendant of RawFieldList that limits the range of valid elements to field types 0..254 and supplies additional functionality specific to headerfield lists.
PwsFile Top level structure of this library to represent a PasswordSafe (PWS) database file.
PwsFileEvent Events available for PwsFileListener objects.
PwsFileFactory This is a singleton factory class used to load and save PasswordSafe files.
PwsFileHeaderV3 This class represents the header fields of a PasswordSafe V3 database (persistent state) and allows to obtain objects enabling to read the remainder of the file in a decrypted fashion or to save the header to a new persistent state.
PwsFileInputSocket PwsFileInputSocket organises data input from a simple underlying data stream in order to read a persistent state of a PWS file and make its data content available to the user in a decrypted and handsome form.
PwsFileOutputSocket PwsFileOutputSocket organises data output to a simple underlying data stream for the purposes of creating a persistent state of a PWS file.
PwsPassphrase PwsPassphrase represents a sequence of characters which is especially protected against uncoverage through attacking tools analysing the JVM memory.
PwsPassphrasePolicy This class defines a policy that will be used to generate a random password.
PwsRawField A RawField contains a cleartext (decrypted) value of a single PWS data field (as it typically occurs in a PWS file).
PwsRecord This class is a container for all data fields belonging to a PasswordSafe record.
PwsRecordList Top level structure of this library to represent a list of PWS records (PwsRecord).
RawFieldList RawFieldList implements a map from field names (0..255) into type PwsRawField.
TestC_InputSocket  
TestC_RawFields
